body_html: Yes, we should be running those tests. You can add the h5py package to install_pip_packages.sh (and possibly the 3.5 version of that), then the tests should start running. @caisq FYI in case I forgot something important that would make that a bad idea.

body: Yes, we should be running those tests. You can add the h5py package to install_pip_packages.sh (and possibly the 3.5 version of that), then the tests should start running. @caisq FYI in case I forgot something important that would make that a bad idea.
